title: Arabic Immersion School Will Be One Of The First In U.S.
teaser: Soon, children as young as 4 years old will be able to learn Arabic at a new public school in Houston, Texas.
contentencoded:
Arabic is one of the most popular languages in the world, with almost 300 million speakers. Soon, children as young as 4 years old will learn Arabic at a new public school in Houston, Texas.

The Arabic Immersion Magnet School is one of the first programs of its kind in the nation, and it’s also stirring some controversy.

Laura Isensee with Here & Now contributor Houston Public Media has the story.
